node.title: Israeli court halts auction of Auschwitz tattoo kit
node.alt: Eight metal dies sit on a green surface.
node.description: An Israeli court suspendsÂ the auction of a partial tattoo kit billed as having been used on inmates at the Auschwitz death camp, following an outcry from Holocaust survivors.
node.content:
["An Israeli court has suspended the auction of a partial tattoo kit billed as having been used on inmates at the Auschwitz death camp, following an outcry from Holocaust survivors.", "Obtained from a private collector, the eight fingernail-sized steel dies, each lined with pins to form numerals, would have been pressed into prisoners' flesh with ink to brand their serial numbers, according to auctioneer Meir Tzolman.", "His website had deemed it \"the most shocking of Holocaust items\", with a projected sale value of more than $US30,000 ($40,374).", "Bidding reached $3,400 by Wednesday, when the Tel Aviv District Court granted a request by survivors to order the auction halted pending a November\u00a016 hearing on whether it should proceed.", "The auctioneer's\u00a0website was amended to show the sale had been suspended.", "More than 1.1 million people, most of them Jews, were killed at Auschwitz, among a number of camps run by Nazi Germany on occupied Polish soil during World War II.", "It was the only facility that tattooed inmates.", "", "
The tattoos, such as the one on Polish-born Auschwitz\u00a0survivor Meyer Hack's arm,\u00a0are an enduring reminder of the Holocaust.(Reuters: Baz Ratner)
", "Israel does not have laws preventing the private sale\u00a0of Holocaust relics.", "A court spokesman's statement did not specify the legal basis for Wednesday's injunction.", "Yad Vashem, the world Holocaust remembrance centre in Jerusalem, said it should have possession of items like the tattoo dies.", "\"The trade of these items is morally unacceptable and only encourages the proliferation of counterfeits,\" Dani Dayan, chairman of Yad Vashem, said.", "Interviewed before the court injunction, Mr Tzolman said he was the grandson of Holocaust survivors who had been tattooed.", "He defended the auction, from which he would take a 25 per cent\u00a0commission,\u00a0as a means of ensuring the dies reached \"the right hands\".", "\"We received calls from tens of people who want to bid on this item and donate it. Each one noted a name of a different museum related to the Holocaust.\"", "", "
Representatives from a variety of museums related to the Holocaust reportedly expressed interest in the tattoo kit.(Reuters:\u00a0Ronen Zvulun)
", "Mr Tzolman said the dies had been certified as having come from Auschwitz. He did not share the documentation with Reuters.", "The United States Holocaust Memorial Museum's website said\u00a0some Auschwitz tattoos were applied by stylus and others using \"a special metal stamp, holding interchangeable numbers made up of needles approximately one centimetre long\".", "The Auschwitz Memorial in Poland said photographs of the dies appeared similar to those in its collection.", "\"If they would be authentic, then the very fact that such unique historical items are put up for auction \u2014\u00a0and not given to an institution that commemorates the victims and educates about the tragedy of Auschwitz \u2014\u00a0deserves the words of protest and condemnation,\" said memorial press officer Pawel Sawicki.\u00a0", "Reuters"]
